name: test_e2e_with_logs[010_SQLI_BYPASS_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_001` |
| **Name** | MySQL version comment WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/*!50000 UNION*/ /*!50000 SELECT*/ version(),NULL,NULL --`
- **Encoded**: `%21*50000%20UNION*%2F%20%21*50000%20SELECT*%2F%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:41:09.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BYPASS_001-1765806069482-ce7rzu pattern_id=SQLI_BYPASS_001 uri=/?q=%21*50000%20UNION*%2F%20%21*50000%20SELECT*%2F%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:41:09.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BYPASS_001-1765806069482-ce7rzu pattern_id=SQLI_BYPASS_001 uri=/?q=%21*50000%20UNION*%2F%20%21*50000%20SELECT*%2F%20version()%2CNULL%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
